com.communote.server.core.tasks

Class RunScheduledTasksJob

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.QuartzJobBean
      • com.communote.server.core.tasks.RunScheduledTasksJob
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.quartz.InterruptableJob, org.quartz.Job

    public class RunScheduledTasksJob
extends org.springframework.scheduling.quartz.QuartzJobBean
implements org.quartz.InterruptableJob
    Looks for tasks to be run and schedules the execution of the handlers these tasks.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/
